definition: not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
desert/unconcerned
(negative prefix)/not/no
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The drinkers also seem more blase than ever about the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 而他们似乎对后果也更加地漠不关心。

sentences.english: Operating in a vacuum of disinterest has done nothing to grow the sport.
sentences.chinese: 漠不关心的态度对这项运动的发展没有任何好处。

sentences.english: We should be warm towards our comrades, not ice cold and indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 看待同志要满腔热忱，不能冷冷清清，漠不关心。

sentences.english: Does not everything begin with indifference?
sentences.chinese: 开始时不也总是漠不关心的吗？

sentences.english: Some operators don't give a damn.
sentences.chinese: 一些运营者对此漠不关心。
他耸耸肩，漠不关心的样子。

sentences.english: Apart from his study, he is indifferent to everything because he comes from a defunct family.
sentences.chinese: 除此以外，他对所有无关于己的事情漠不关心。

sentences.english: PIERRE BOULEZ. Is there really only lack of attention, indifference on the part of the listener toward contemporary music?
sentences.chinese: 听众对当代音乐真的缺乏注意和漠不关心吗？

sentences.english: Many people keep aloof from politics.
sentences.chinese: 许多人对政治漠不关心。

sentences.english: He was as indifferent to his powers as they were prolific.
sentences.chinese: 他对于他那多产的创作力漠不关心。

sentences.english: Indifference to these problems will mean committing suicide.
sentences.chinese: 对这些问题漠不关心将意味着自我毁灭。

sentences.english: One of his assistants was careless about a culture of chicken cholera germs.
sentences.chinese: 他的一位助手对一组鸡霍乱培养菌漠不关心。

sentences.english: On can always be kind to people one cares nothing about.
sentences.chinese: 对于哪些偶们漠不关心地人，偶们总能做到温文尔雅。

sentences.english: I wasn’t going to let him off so lightly.
sentences.chinese: 我不能这样漠不关心地让他离去。

sentences.english: Have we been greedy, ignorant, uncaring?
sentences.chinese: 难道我们一直很贪婪，无知，漠不关心？

definition: not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
a matter of no concern to oneself (idiom)
to set to one side and ignore (idiom); quite indifferent/cold and uncaring
aloof/indifferent/unconcerned
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
to turn a blind eye to
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
to feel unconcerned and let matters rest (idiom)
pinyin: shi4 bu4 guan1 ji3 , gao1 gao1 gua4 qi3

definition: to hear but not react (idiom); to turn a deaf ear/to ignore deliberately
to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear
numbed/insensitive/apathetic/thick-skinned
cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
apathetic/indifferent/unsympathetic
to pay no heed to (idiom)/to ignore/to brush aside
to pay no attention to a familiar sight/to ignore
